short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the priority row from the Pivotal Tracker story to remove any confusion as of now

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Having priority row feature from Pivotal Tracker creates confusion, as the stories are prioritized based on their order in ascending order. This plugin hides the priority row from the story grooming, so you will not be confused by the redundant feature.
